SEARCH
Package com.bcb.vetra.controllers

Class PrescriptionController

java.lang.Object
com.bcb.vetra.controllers.PrescriptionController
@PreAuthorize("isAuthenticated()") @RestController public class PrescriptionController extends Object
Controller for prescriptions.

This class is responsible for handling all HTTP requests related to prescriptions.

  • Constructor Details

    • PrescriptionController

      public PrescriptionController(PrescriptionDao prescriptionDao, UserDao userDao, PatientDao patientDao)

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/patients/{patientId}/prescriptions") public List<PrescriptionWithMedication> getAll(@PathVariable int patientId, Principal principal)
      Gets all prescriptions for a patient. Verifies permission by calling the access control service. If a user owns the patient, or if they are an admin or doctor, they can access the prescriptions.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      principal - The currently logged in user.
      Returns:
      A list of all prescriptions for the patient.

    • get

      @GetMapping("/patients/{patientId}/prescriptions/{prescriptionId}") public PrescriptionWithMedication get(@PathVariable int patientId, @PathVariable int prescriptionId, Principal principal)
      Gets a prescription by its ID. Verifies permission by calling the access control service. If a user owns the patient, or if they are an admin or doctor, they can access the prescription.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription.
      principal - The currently logged in user.
      Returns:
      The prescription with the given ID.

    • create

      @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'DOCTOR\', \'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping("/patients/{patientId}/prescriptions") public PrescriptionWithMedication create(@PathVariable int patientId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid PrescriptionWithMedication prescription)
      Creates a new prescription for a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      prescription - The prescription to create.
      Returns:
      The created prescription.

    • update

      @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'DOCTOR\', \'ADMIN\')") @PutMapping("/patients/{patientId}/prescriptions/{prescriptionId}") public PrescriptionWithMedication update(@PathVariable int patientId, @PathVariable int prescriptionId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid PrescriptionWithMedication prescription)
      Updates a prescription for a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription.
      prescription - The prescription to update.
      Returns:
      The updated prescription.

    • delete

      @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'DOCTOR\', \'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @DeleteMapping("/patients/{patientId}/prescriptions/{prescriptionId}") public void delete(@PathVariable int patientId, @PathVariable int prescriptionId)
      Deletes a prescription for a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription.
